pageProduct.name: Raw Essentials Sleep Blend Loose Leaf Tea
pageProduct.description:
General Information

CALMS THE MIND
RELAXES THE BODY

Our sleep is so often neglected with our busy schedules and overactive minds.

The sleep blend is a combination of flowers and herbs that are designed specifically to help you unwind and prepare for a good night’s sleep.

Chamomile has been used since Roman times as a sedative.
Lemongrass prolongs your sleep and calms your muscles and nerves.
Passionflower helps to relieve anxiety and insomnia.
This combination makes for a beautiful nightly ritual to calm your mind and relax your body.

Ingredients

Chamomile, Passion Flower, Lemongrass, Rose Petals, Lavender Buds
